General.Name: Winfarm
General.Description: WINFARM Société anonyme engages in the provision of design and manufacture, distribution, experimentation, and advisory services to breeders and the agricultural worldwide. The company offers consultancy in crop production and training for farmers; provides distance selling to farmers, horse breeders and landscape gardeners and professionals; and design and manufacture of animal health and hygiene solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Loudéac, France.
General.Address: Zone Industrielle de Très Le Bois, Loudéac, France, 22600
